text: Gianni Patrignani (1906–1991) was an Italian swimmer. He competed in the men's 4 × 200 metre freestyle relay event at the 1924 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1991 deaths Category:Italian male swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of Italy Category:Swimmers at the 1924 Summer Olympics Category:People from Pesaro
title: Gianni Patrignani
